mapper.select: select * from ( select a.acc_no, a.acc_id, a.acc_name, p.point_score acc_point, c.code_detail acc_state, rank() over(order by p.point_score desc) point_rank from view_account a inner join tbl_code c on a.account_state = c.code_no inner join ( select account_no, sum(point_score) point_score from tbl_point where point_date > trunc(sysdate, 'MM') group by account_no) p on a.acc_no = p.account_no) where point_rank <= 3
